tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Layers & selections=Layers & selections
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Learn the fundamentals about using layers and selections to create a photo collage.=Learn the fundamentals about using layers and selections to create a photo collage.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Add dramatic flair=Add dramatic flair
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Add a sense of motion and mystery to your photo by isolating your subject and using a motion blur on your background.=Add a sense of motion and mystery to your photo by isolating your subject and using a motion blur on your background.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Paint with effects=Paint with effects
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Make the subject of your photo really stand out by painting your image with special effects.=Make the subject of your photo really stand out by painting your image with special effects.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Replace colors=Replace colors
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Change the color of an object while retaining its texture, shading, and detail.=Change the color of an object while retaining its texture, shading, and detail.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Create camera layers=Create camera layers
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Use your tablet’s camera while working in Photoshop Touch. Add a face to this pirate portrait in a few easy steps.=Use your tablet’s camera while working in Photoshop Touch. Add a face to this pirate portrait in a few easy steps.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Make a pencil sketch=Make a pencil sketch
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Turn your color photograph into a crosshatched pencil sketch in a few easy steps.=Turn your color photograph into a crosshatched pencil sketch in a few easy steps.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Create photo frames=Create photo frames
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Create a quick frame or border for your photo. Then use the layer blend modes to create different transparent frame effects.=Create a quick frame or border for your photo. Then use the layer blend modes to create different transparent frame effects.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Add a tattoo=Add a tattoo
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Add a tattoo by transforming and applying a simple graphic to any area of skin in a photo.=Add a tattoo by transforming and applying a simple graphic to any area of skin in a photo.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Make a painting=Make a painting
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Experiment with different painting styles. Use a variety of brush stroke effects to create different looks.=Experiment with different painting styles. Use a variety of brush stroke effects to create different looks.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Add people to images=Add people to images
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Combine separate photos of people to make it appear as though they were together when the image was shot.=Combine separate photos of people to make it appear as though they were together when the image was shot.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Drop Shadow Text=Drop Shadow Text
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Learn to quickly create some text, give it a custom color, rotate or resize it, and then add a drop shadow to add dimension.=Learn to quickly create some text, give it a custom color, rotate or resize it, and then add a drop shadow to add dimension.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Antique photos=Antique photos
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Apply a sepia tone and a few other effects to make your photo look like it was created 100 years ago.=Apply a sepia tone and a few other effects to make your photo look like it was created 100 years ago.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Clean up a background=Clean up a background
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Remove unwanted background clutter while protecting the parts of your image that you want to keep.=Remove unwanted background clutter while protecting the parts of your image that you want to keep.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Smooth image blending=Smooth image blending
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Combine two photos seamlessly using a gradient within the Add Fade feature. You control where the fade starts and stops.=Combine two photos seamlessly using a gradient within the Add Fade feature. You control where the fade starts and stops.

tutorialinfo.title: $$$/TutorialToc/Tilt-shift effect=Tilt-shift effect
tutorialinfo.author: Adobe
tutorialinfo.description: $$$/TutorialToc/Create the impression of a miniature landscape with this popular photographic technique.=Create the impression of a miniature landscape with this popular photographic technique.
